Title: toIntervalMicrosecond
Description: Returns an interval of n microseconds of data type IntervalMicrosecond.
n — Number of microseconds. Integer numbers or string representations thereof, and float numbers. (U)Int*/Float*/String.
Examples: WITH    toDateTime('2024-06-15') AS date,    toIntervalMicrosecond(30) AS interval_to_microsecondsSELECT date + interval_to_microseconds AS result
